Diary of Lydia:

Twenty-fourth day of Shilen.


My invitation to Nidrah was delivered quickly, and it was too easy!

I was in such a hurry when I was preparing for his arrival! I had to make a thousand mistakes, but he did not complain! Was he too cute? Or maybe he just does not care!

He told me that he was here on business; and this business does not have anything in common with our family.
